snippet: Jurors from the John Edwards trial appeared on morning network television shows to talk about their deliberations. Some jurors said they believed Mr. Edwards was guilty but the government did not make its case.
abstract: Jurors from the John Edwards trial appeared on morning network television shows to talk about their deliberations. Some jurors said they believed Mr. Edwards was guilty but the government did not make its case.

headline.main: Jurors in Edwards Case Say Prosecutors Failed to Present Enough Evidence
